statements: SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT click_count, click_date FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_id, click_count FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE click_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE click_count > 10 ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, click_count FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, click_count, click_date FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT click_date, click_count, ad_id, campaign_id FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE click_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(click_count) AS total_clicks FROM ad_campaign_clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, click_count, ad_id, click_date FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, click_date FROM ad_campaign_clicks WHERE ad_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_campaigns JOIN click_through_rates ON ad_campaigns.id = click_through_rates.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN click_through_rates ON ad_campaigns.id = click_through_rates.campaign_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_campaigns, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN click_through_rates ON ad_campaigns.id = click_through_rates.campaign_id WHERE clicks > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget < 10000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT click_id, revenue FROM ad_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_time > '2021-09-15 12:00:00';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(click_id) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 10;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_metrics.revenue FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_metrics ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_metrics.click_id;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_id, COUNT(ad_clicks.click_id) AS click_count FROM ad_campaigns LEFT JOIN ad_clicks ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_clicks.campaign_id GROUP BY ad_campaigns.campaign_id HAVING click_count > 5 ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM click_data WHERE device_type='mobile';
SELECT user_id, first_name, email FROM user_data WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp, user_id, device_type FROM click_data WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_count FROM ads WHERE click_count > 100;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, unique_users FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_clicks >= 500 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks WHERE click_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT ad_name, click_count FROM ads WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT ad_name, user_name, click_timestamp FROM ads JOIN clicks ON ads.ad_id = clicks.ad_id WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, unique_users FROM ad_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON ad_campaigns.id = campaign_performance.campaign_id WHERE total_clicks > 5000 ORDER BY unique_users DESC LIMIT 10;
